nodes.text: Around 4043 BBY, the two Dark Councilors Darth Qalar and Darth Victun fought a Kaggath in the Imperial Citadel on Dromund Kaas. The Kaggath tore the Citadel to the ground, and when the dust settled the other ten members of the Council promptly killed both Qalar and Victun. The Citadel's rebuilding would be overseen by Darth Nostrem, who built it according to designs provided by the Dark Council and the Sith Emperor.
